member.name: T:Z80NavBarControl.Z80_Navigation
member.summary:
Z80_Navigation user control working as 'navigation control' ChangeLog: - Version: 1.0.0.0 / Release 11-08-2016 - Version: 1.0.0.1 / Release 05-17-2017 (Tooltip behaviour) - Version: 1.0.0.2 / Release 05-18-2017 (AutoVerticalScrollBar propery) - Version: 1.0.0.3 / Release 05-19-2017 (ShowItemsBorder propery) - Version: 1.0.0.4 / Release 05-19-2017 (Nuget version and Default event attribute) - Version: 1.0.0.5 / Release 07-19-2017

member.summary: Sometimes when click on item the 'real' selected is the 1st available chilc

member.summary: Initialize (and draws) the control. This method should de called only one time

member.name: M:Z80NavBarControl.Z80_Navigation.AddItem(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add a new item (always a child) in run-time to navigation control
member.param: The new item ID. Make sure that new item no longer exist in any other ithem
Optional value for left text position

member.name: M:Z80NavBarControl.Z80_Navigation.ItemChangeEnable(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set item as enable or disable in run-time
member.param: if you set enable to false the item can not be clicked and also display as 'grayed'
item ID we want to enable or disable

member.name: M:Z80NavBarControl.Z80_Navigation.ItemChangeVisibility(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set item visibility in run-time
member.param: item ID we want to setup it visibility

member.name: M:Z80NavBarControl.Z80_Navigation.ItemSelect(System.Int32)
member.summary: Select item in run-time
member.param: item ID we want to select
